restlib.net

Class Uri

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.net.IRI
      • restlib.net.Uri

  • @Immutable
public final class Uri
extends IRI
    A representation of an Uniform Resource Identifier as defined in RFC3986.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static UriBuilder builder()
      Returns a new UriBuilder instance.
      Uri canonicalize()
      Returns the canonical version of this IRI.
      static Uri parse(CharSequence input)
      Parses a Uri from its String representation.
      static Uri relativeReference(Uri base, Uri relative)
      Returns the results of performing the reference resolution of relative against base per the rules defined in section 5 of RFC3986.
      static TagBuilder tagBuilder()
      Returns a new TagBuilder instance.

      • Methods inherited from class restlib.net.IRI

        authority, equals, fragment, hashCode, host, isAbsolute, path, port, query, relativeReference, scheme, toIRI, toString, toUri, userinfo

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static UriBuilder builder()
        Returns a new UriBuilder instance.

      • tagBuilder

        public static TagBuilder tagBuilder()
        Returns a new TagBuilder instance.

      • parse

        public static Uri parse(CharSequence input)
        Parses a Uri from its String representation.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if input is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if input is not parseable.

      • relativeReference

        public static Uri relativeReference(Uri base,
                    Uri relative)
        Returns the results of performing the reference resolution of relative against base per the rules defined in section 5 of RFC3986.
        Parameters:
        base - an absolute Uri.
        relative - a non-null Uri.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if base or relative are null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if base is not an absolute Uri.

      • canonicalize

        public Uri canonicalize()
        Description copied from class: IRI
        Returns the canonical version of this IRI.

        Note if the scheme component of this IRI is empty, this method returns the same IRI.

        Overrides:
        canonicalize in class IRI
